attributes.action: introduce more stringent censorship laws on the media in the UK .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To immediately introduce much more stringent censorship laws on the media in the UK . That all television broadcasters within the UK bleep out in all tv programmes , films etc the taking of God`s holy name in vain . That the media within the UK are prosecuted to the full if they illegally  infringe upon an individual`s human rights or abuse the current privacy laws as they so often do without prosecution in the courts . That the Human Rights Act is enforced by the legal establishment in relation to the current UK media .
